Contact Iowa CYP

Reach the team that walks alongside Iowa Guard families

Send a note for event help, school support, partnership ideas, or anything family-related. We’ll route your message to the teammate who can respond fastest.

Email the team

General contact

We’re a call or message away

Email: iaarngcyp@gmail.com

Phone: 515-252-4050

We reply within two business days. Need help right now? Visit the Iowa National Guard Warrior & Family Services branch.

Visit us

Camp Dodge, Johnston

Camp Dodge Rec Hall - 7105 NW 78th Ave Bldg 3585, Johnston IA 50131

We’re beside the Iowa Gold Star Military Museum inside Camp Dodge. Bring a valid ID for gate access.

Meet your points of contact

Connect directly with the coordinators supporting Iowa CYP

Chris and Erin both work out of Camp Dodge and team up on statewide programming. Reach out and we’ll cover your regional needs or loop in partners who can help.

Chris Cox

Lead Child & Youth Program Coordinator

JTSI Contractor

Chris Cox leads the Iowa Army National Guard Child & Youth Program. He grew up in a Guard family and knows firsthand how much encouragement matters. Based out of Camp Dodge, Chris partners with Erin to plan statewide programs and cover regional events so every Guard family feels supported.

christopher.j.cox18.ctr@army.mil 515-727-3064

Erin Coogler

Child & Youth Program Coordinator

JTSI Contractor

Erin Coogler is a Program Coordinator who brings a child-development background and a big heart for Guard families. Working alongside Chris at Camp Dodge, she helps design statewide camps, kits, and trainings—and meets families on the road when regional events pop up.

iaarngcyp@gmail.com 515-252-4050

Fostering community, resilience, and positive development among Iowa's military-connected children and families.
